name: @kodnificent/sparouter
description: A light weight SPA router basically for frontend routing

scripts.plugin-ready: npm run development -- --removeConsole && npm run production
scripts.build-readme: documentation build README.js -f md -o README.md --shallow && documentation build README.js -f html -o ./docs/README.html --shallow && documentation build ./src/sparouter.js -f md -o ./API.md --shallow &&  documentation build ./src/sparouter.js -f html -o ./docs/API.html --shallow

author: sirvic-tech
